dict.string: Go Rucky Yourself reads your health data to track your heart rate during ruck sessions, which helps calculate calorie burn more accurately.
Go Rucky Yourself saves your ruck sessions as workouts in Apple Health, including distance, time, calories burned, and elevation data to help you track your fitness progress.
Go Rucky Yourself uses your location to track your routes, calculate distance, pace and elevation during ruck sessions. Background location is used when tracking an active session.
This app needs background location access to track your rucking sessions even when the app is in the background.
Go Rucky Yourself needs your location to track your routes, calculate distance, pace and elevation during ruck sessions. Your location data is only used while the app is in use.
Your data will be used to provide you with a better and personalized rucking experience and to help improve our features.
